      • removeEmptyTransitions

        public void removeEmptyTransitions(AvatarBlock _block,
                          boolean _canOptimize)
        Removes all empty transitions between two states. This concerns also the start state, and end states. DO NOT take into account code of states, and start states
        Parameters:
        block - The block containing the state machine
